'Phosphorus trichloride' is a chemical compound of phosphorus and chlorine,
having chemical formula PCl 3. It has a trigonal pyramidal shape. It
is the most important of the three phosphorus chlorides. It is an important
industrial chemical, being used for the manufacture of organophosphorus
compounds for a wide variety of applications. It has a 31 P NMR signal
at around +220 ppm with reference to a phosphoric acid standard.
